definitions.text: a device that prevents an automotive engine from starting
examples: car theives know how to bypass the ignition interlock

definitions.text: the act of interlocking or meshing
examples: an interlocking of arms by the police held the crowd in check

definitions.text: coordinate in such a way that all parts work together effectively

examples: He locked his hands around her neck

definitions.text: become engaged or intermeshed with one another
